lessons.title: What is AI?  Understanding the Basics (with cake!)
AI vs. Machine Learning vs. Deep Learning: Unpacking the Jargon
Generative AI: Creating things with AI (like writing poems and drawing pictures)
Introduction to Large Language Models (LLMs):  Chatbots and beyond
Hands-on: Building a simple chatbot with a pre-trained LLM
Vector Databases: Organizing information like a library for AI
Building a search engine using LLMs and vector databases
Agentic AI:  Giving AI the ability to plan and act (like a smart assistant)
Building a simple agent with Python
Reinforcement Learning: Teaching AI through rewards and punishments (like training a dog)
A simple Reinforcement Learning project:  Training an AI to play a game
Transformers: Under the hood of LLMs (the engine that makes it work)
Attention mechanisms explained simply
Multi-Agent Systems:  Teams of AIs working together (like a soccer team)
Building a simple multi-agent system simulation
Tool Use for AI: Giving AI access to external tools (like a calculator or search engine)
LangChain introduction and practical applications
LangGraph: Connecting LLMs to knowledge graphs (enhancing reasoning)
AI Architecture: Designing robust and scalable AI systems
Deploying your AI models: From prototype to production
